about.title: About me
about.about_me: Iâ€™m a full-stack web developer focused on building custom websites and applications that meet the specific needs of businesses. I enjoy working on both front-end design and back-end architecture, ensuring clean, responsive layouts and scalable code for efficient and secure sites that can grow alongside your business.

kasa.name: Kasa
kasa.description: Front-end development of an online accommodation rental platform, allowing users to browse listings with detailed descriptions, photos, and reviews. This is a modern web application optimized for all screen types: desktop, tablet, and mobile. The project highlights the use of React and React Router to create interactive applications with reusable components, efficient state and side-effect management, as well as a responsive design developed with Sass.

nina_carducci.name: Nina Carducci's portfolio
nina_carducci.description: This project involved the comprehensive optimization of Nina Carducci's portfolio website, focusing on improving performance, accessibility, and search engine optimization (SEO). I conducted detailed audits using Lighthouse and GTMetrix to identify areas for enhancement and implemented various optimizations based on the findings.

footer.message_part_2: for freelance work opportunities. Feel free to email me if you have any questions or would like to discuss potential projects or collaborations.
